website_summaries.verdict: An exceptionally popular model ideal for those wanting a smaller organizer for their office supplies.
pros: Sold in either silver or black
Includes a larger storage bin for sticky notes, and 3 smaller bins for other supplies
cons: A few customers had issues with the product arriving damaged from shipping

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I loved this office organizer ! It's not too big and not to small, the perfect size ! It looks exactly as the picture shows. It has two pockets , one for paper clips or thumbtacks on top , and then one for sticky notes. It even fits my scissors and stapler. Definitely recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Versatile. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Holds a good amount but isn't too big. Height is just right. I love the four divisions. I keep my pens and art supplies on one side, makeup brushes and eye pencils on the other. The shallow shelves in the middle are perfect for small desktop items like calligraphy nibs and staplers. The little drawer is handy as well. The rubber grips at the bottom prevent it from sliding around on my cheap Ikea desk. Great little find.
customer_reviews.author: eula

customer_reviews.title: high capacity
customer_reviews.text: I had many pens scattered everywhere in various containers, so I bought this and actually fit everything into it! I used this organizer to sort my pile into black pens, colored pens, pencils/led pencils, and markers. I almost bought the "Rolodex Mesh Collection Oval Supply Caddy" instead, but I'm happy I went with this, otherwise I don't think I would've been able to fit as many pens of sorts. PROS: high capacity bottom rubber grip sturdy mesh
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this product. I was surprised how much it holds. I saw a few negative reviews about some of the trays missing but I received everything as shown in the picture. Quality product, drawers easy to open, no assembly. I bought the silver and it looks very nice. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job but is poorly constructed. Arrived with dents, misaligned structure, and loose parts. The sections for the removable parts were not put together correctly. The drawer constantly falls out at the slightest movement (I'll be moving this organizer from under my desk to on top of my desk throughout the day). The two-section piece only fits on one side (until I forcibly bent the metal structure). Many of the metal pieces clearly don't line up and aren't joined at the correct angles. But, as a mostly-out-of-sight organizer for work, it does fine. I mean it holds office supplies. Can't ask for much more at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great little storage unit for the price, but watch out for how it's leveled
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a 2-star on 'sturdiness', and the rating has nothing to do with it being sturdy, as it's really very sturdily constructed of steel. The rating was more for that fact that it 'rocks', in the sence that it's not well leveled. If you hold the unit face-on, you can see that it's got a slight twist to it, and when you set it on a flat surface, it can rock slightly from one corner to the other. Not a real big deal, it's still useful, and I'll use it as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Marx

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this organizer. I have tried to 3d print an organizer but it always seems flimsy, this is weighty and offers enough space for pens, markers, various screwdrivers and various tools for my cricut machine. While the drawer can be used for note pads, I use it for micro sd cards or other misc. things I need to keep safe. The top is where I hold some of my cricut accessories such as the score took or extra knife. I have thought about buying another one!
customer_reviews.author: V.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great desk organizer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic desk organizer! I actually bought 2- one for my desk at work and one now that I am working remotely. As a teacher, I have a ton of pens, pencils, post-its, paper clips, and binder clips I like to have at hand. The storage capacity is great. I am able to put a lot of writing utensils in the organizer. I also can store large sharpies, too. It is a sturdy item and sits flat on the desk. It also looks great. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: I'm super happy I picked this one
customer_reviews.text: This desk organizer fit my needs perfectly. I don't work from home or anything but we do have a home office which we use to do random computer and printing stuff and our desk doesn't actually have any drawers so it had gotten to the point where we had several different containers holding various items. I'm super happy I picked this one. The price was hard to argue and the size was just right for the desk. Now all the clutter is gone! It fit all our desk supplies what more could a person ask for? Oh, and yes, the little rubber feet prevent sliding quite nicely.
customer_reviews.author: PatriciaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nice little kitchen counter storage bin
customer_reviews.text: If you're like us there's always a little bit of a mess on one of the kitchen counters. Notes, pens, candy, recipes, junk, etc. Finally had enough and ordered this. Plenty of storage for the usually accumulation of junk... ummm... stuff and nicely compartmentalized. Sturdy for the price as well. My only gotcha is why the heck did this review ask me to rate "remote control"... Unless it's referring to me shouting at one of the family to "put it in the storage container" :)
customer_reviews.author: R. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to reorganize my pen jar on my kitchen counter, and this has worked perfectly. I have put scissors in one compartment, pens in another, pencils in another, markers/Sharpies in the fourth. The pullout drawer holds standard sticky notes nicely, which is great since my three year old loves to steal them if he can see them, and I keep paper clips in the top (removable) compartment. This has held clean up my counter AND my junk drawer a little.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Guptill

customer_reviews.title: Keeps us tidy, awesome design
customer_reviews.text: So glad I finally spring for a decent office supply organizer, sheesh! It keeps my "junk shelf" so, so, so much more usable. Great size, holds everything but still fits on my bookshelf nicely. I looked at a LOT before purchasing this one but they were all going to be too small. This is well-designed and well-made. The cubbies and bins are just right for our pens, scissors, glue, rubber bands, paperclips, post-it notes, and miscellaneous bits and bobs. Silver color is handsome and smart-looking. Very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Orion Isis Gray Lumiere

customer_reviews.title: Four compartments for pens
customer_reviews.text: Having four separate pen compartments is great as most similar items do not have this feature. There is a little two compartment box for paperclips or odd and ends and plenty of space of post-its and a sweet little drawer for odds and end or whatever you want. It looks good; it is compact; it holds a tremendous amount; it is well-made and, I suspect, will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Global Kate

customer_reviews.title: Awesome organizer for office things on desk - Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This office organizer is awesome! It's not too big and bulky where it's a nuisance on your desk, and it's not too small as to where you can't fit anything in it. It's honestly the perfect size. It looks exactly as the picture shows. It fits everything you need like paperclips, pens, pencils, sticky notes, staples, white out, sharpies, stapler, scissors, tape, etc. Awesome desk/office supplies organizer! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Hier

customer_reviews.title: This is such a nice caddy it was better than I expected and it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice caddy it was better than I expected and it looks so neat and tidy on my desk. I really hate those big clumsy desk organizers because I really need all my desk top space. People come in my office and ask me all the time where I got it but when they find out how much I paid for it they are surprised because the regular office supply store just rip you off with charging so much for desk supplies. I would buy more items from this company.
customer_reviews.author: P. Callen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommended to help organize
customer_reviews.text: Use this as an organizer for little odds and ends at my barber station and it's probably my favorite organizer. Big enough to hold a few pair of shears, my square card reader, some business cards, 5 or 6 combs, some little metal hair clips, and a couple other little things. It's a sturdy little product and I recommended it to all of the barbers in my shop.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Compact yet Spacious
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with this desk organizer! It is smaller than I expected size wise, but has great capacity. I have what seems like a billion pens in each of the four cups, and the small trays on top hold a good amount of paper clips In the front, and a self-inking stamp and a bottle of white out in the back. The drawer on the front holds several pads of post it’s. The best part is that although it holds a massive amount of stuff, it takes up very little space on my desk and looks very sleek. It is well made and is holding up great so far (I’ve had it for almost 8 months). Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Neubig

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted & holds A LOT of stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 TV/other remotes, a cordless phone, small scissors, reading glasses - in a case, 6+ Sharpies and pens, 4 Bic lighters, my Galaxy S3 phone (yes, it's old!), and then there's stuff in the drawer... I was able to put the plastic "2-section" piece into the drawer (in the center of the drawer works best) so there's a two wider sections on top in the middle. I now have almost everything at my fingertips. ...and a great price also. I bought one... and then a second one.
customer_reviews.author: E3Racer

customer_reviews.title: A Total Penswrangler!
customer_reviews.text: If I had to guess (and I do, because I'm not at home), I'd say there are 42 drawers in my home. And there was a time when every single one of them had a pen in it. How a Pilot ends up in a drawer which only holds a bag of ne'er-used cotton balls is an absolute mystery to me. A mystery to all of us, really. Then, this DecoBros thing comes along and it wrangled my pens faster than the faster penswrangler could. (Admit it – you read the portmanteau "penswrangler" wrong. It's okay. We all did.) Couple it with theand chalk up a cheap organizational victory!
customer_reviews.author: Damien S

customer_reviews.title: Even better than advertised! Comes backed with lifetime guarantee.
customer_reviews.text: There were a couple of these online, but this one was quite a bit less expensive. I figured I'd give it a try. Imagine my surprise when I saw that it came with a lifetime guarantee. I mean, really, just a little desk thingy, but I never have to worry about it! Its sturdy and well made. I love that one of the top sections can be sectioned into two or just one section. The drawer fits post it notes, but I am using it for some other things I like to keep handy on my desk. Everything I want plus more fits conveniently in it. VERY happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: julieann22

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so afraid that this might be flimsy like the other organizers I've purchased, however... It turned out to be totally freakin' AWESOME!!! It's sturdy, has 4 pen/scissor/tool areas that were much bigger than expected, as well as 4 other compartments for sticky notes, paper clips, tacks, rubber bands, etc. Best purchase so far!!!
customer_reviews.author: MandyK

customer_reviews.title: MORE VERSATILE THAN OFFICE SUPPLIES
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I, however, do not use it for an office or desk of any kind. I put this on my bathroom counter and put all my hair brushes, combs, and alligator clips in the 4 compartments on the sides. I put all my pony tail holders in the pull out drawer, and then put all my bobby pins and small clips in the top middle section. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made...Supplies Fit Nicely
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I received my desk organizer, I took it to my desk in my loft. I organized my pens, sharpies, highlighters, scissors, post-it notes, paper clips and a few other items. Everything fits nicely.It looks good on my desk. I like the drawer that fits the 3x3 post-it notes. The organizer is well made. The rubber feet holds it securely to my desk, it does not slide. The organizer is slightly different then what is pictured, but I still like it. I am very pleased with my purchase and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome organizer! Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is much more spacious than it appears. I have 12 pens and 12 sharpies at the right side (with room for more), 2 pairs of reading glasses and 4 scissors at the left side. Pull out section holds 6-8 stacks of post its. The mesh is sturdy and the bottom has four rubber dot feet to keep the organize in place. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Azulza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm a college student and I have this on my desk in my dorm room. Fits just about everything I need. Perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Organizer for the desk
customer_reviews.text: This desk caddy is perfect for my needs; pens, pencils, scissors, markers, etc. I am in the process of minimizing the clutter on my desk at home, and this caddy replaces two brightly colored 'buckets' I previously used. This black mesh caddy is much more professional looking than a couple of buckets.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Organized
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping pens markers scissors, paper clips, white out, writing pad all in one place. I like that there are for separate compartments. One for pens. One for markers. One for scissor. One for shop knife. This has been used on one of our shipping tables for a year and has held up great. Still looks like new. We are setting up another shipping station and buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice organizer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two. One was a bit torqued so it didn’t sit flat. Removing one of the plastic feet corrected that problem. Otherwise they’re good and actually hold more than I’d expected. The plastic divided cup is an insert for the top front center space and can be removed to be used separately. Convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Watercolorist Holly

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: I got this pencil caddy for my 11yr old up coming artist. Her review in her words: It holds many pencils. The little compartments holds erasers,some crayons, grippers and Lead for my mechanical pencils. More compartments are better then one big one. The rectangle shape is better then a square shape for my desk and gives me more room.
customer_reviews.author: Luckydriver

customer_reviews.title: Great Organizer!
customer_reviews.text: This little caddy turned a big mess into something manageable. Our little end table, between our chairs, had gum packets, hand sanitizer, pens, Post-It notes, eye drops, etc., all over the place, and this little beauty corralled it. We're no longer knocking stuff down and off the table. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly Femme

customer_reviews.title: Great desk organizer
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to decide between this and two other caddies, and I picked this one because it looked like the pen holder areas were bigger than the other ones I was looking at. I'm glad I did pick this one because I have lots of pens and this holds them all with room to spare. I really don't use post it notes at my desk in my apartment, so I've found other smalls to put in the other areas of the caddy.
customer_reviews.author: Deb R.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, attractive, good size
customer_reviews.text: I use this bedside for my glasses, remotes, lense and screen cleaners, and other odds and ends that used to clutter up the table top. The sections are perfect size for these things. I looked at many other organizers before choosing this one. The shape of the sections was selling point .... others were too narrow or rounded off .... the ones on this will fit remotes, glasses case, even phones.
customer_reviews.author: Mr max

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: After doing a lot of looking, I bought this online and was pleased when I put it to use. It definitely holds all your pens/markers, which is notable because the desk organizer that I bought from TJMaxx before this one had just a small compartment and held, like 4 or 5 max. This also has lots of little compartments for flash drives, paper clips, binder clips, etc. Don't be fooled though, in the main picture, the little divided compartment beside the yellow sticky notes is not attached. Does the job, is sturdy, and surprisingly compact. Wish the metal was a cute swirl or something better than mesh.
customer_reviews.author: mollygirl

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: I spent so much time trying to find the correct office organizer for me. Some of them were just soooo big and took up too much room on my desk. This one is perfect. I love the fact that it is mesh and not plastic. A lot of compartments and very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this organizer for makeup and other items that end up scattered on the bathroom countertop. I love it. It is sturdy and has a nice grip surface on the bottom that keeps the unit from sliding when placing or removing items. It also has good storage capacity
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spacious Organizer
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT! Super spacious! Not too bulky. Fits everything you need. Exactly what I needed to work from home during this quarantine, especially as a teacher.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great Small Organiser That Isn't Bulky!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my office desk, as the office supplies my company supplied were like 8 years old and falling apart. This holds a LOT. I have a pen obsession and it holds my entire collection. The little spaces and drawer are great to hold mini clips and misc stuff. I take off a star because the drawer gets stuck sometimes and it's difficult to pull it out and a bit wobbly. But it only happens now and then. (and yes, that is a clinton/gore pin from 1996 sitting in the organiser too! haha)
customer_reviews.author: PittieMom

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this organizer! I saw some at Walmart for the same price, but Walmart’s little tray was plastic, this one is metal and much more sturdy! It is perfect for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Goshe

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly handy
customer_reviews.text: This is handy, easy to use to and fills the massive amount of pens, pencils, brush pens, washi tape and markers I've collected as part of my journaling. I appreciate that it has a number of comparments, makes it extremely easy to organize my stationery, pens, pencils, and other itmes. So I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: coffeescripting

customer_reviews.title: Great product for desk organization
customer_reviews.text: This little caddy was just what I needed to organize my school desk. It fits pens, highlighters, scissors, tons of paperclips and binder clips and looks nice to boot! I couldn't find anything like it at my local office supply store. I may order another one in a different color!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L. Rockett

customer_reviews.title: Small organizer reduces big clutter!
customer_reviews.text: I have a desk where my computer takes up most of the room. I never thought I'd find an organizer that was useful enough but small enough This is it, it's absolutely perfect. Pencils, pens, 2 magnifying glasses, small stapler, eyeglass case, telescoping back scratcher, scissors , erasers , paper clips, you name it . It's compact and very sturdy . I love it!! I needed this years ago and only found it when I searched Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchase it as a gift. She really like it for her desk in her office. I even fill it in with a lot of pencils pens, markers, sticky notes, pens and paper clips. I will definitely recommend it for everyone. It does not take a lot of space from your desk.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband will love this and so do I
customer_reviews.text: Found the plastic white female plugs which happened to get into the plastic bag! Love this product and now I can give it a good review. Also very easy directions on how to put together. Really like the feet underneath so no scratches to furniture. Nice big drawer for pencils pens and pads of paper. Plus section for unread magazines or other materials. Up top there are three holders for mail , documents, etc. and inbetween those more room for books.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The product is not bad, but ordered 2 times due to instability on a flat surface. The first order had to be returned. The metal case of the product is a little distorted and this organizer staggers a bit. Otherwise, there are a lot of departments, everything fits.
customer_reviews.author: Anzhelika Savenko

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Compact, Functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to consolidate old school supplies that currently occupy my desk. The product is large enough to sort a shoebox worth of supplies (pens, pencils, highlighters, erasers, lead, etc) while still being compact enough to not crowd my 22x16 inches of usable desk space. I would definitely recommend this product to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Adebanjo

customer_reviews.title: Really like it.
customer_reviews.text: I am using it to organize an area with a lot of different size things, especially some small things that get easily lost. It's working out very well. When I received it there were some dents but I just used my fingers to push them back out and it was in perfect shape again. If you have complaints about this, consider bubble packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Originally I ordered this caddy to use next to my bed. I am forever looking for the tv remote, my glasses, my kindle......I swear I spend hours each day looking for things that I've "misplaced". This couldn't have worked out any better.....until I walked into my bathroom and noticed all the stuff laying all over my double sink countertop. To make a very long story short, the caddy is now resting center stage on the counter, holding all my "use daily" junk (which led to cleaning out everything in the under counter cupboards.....anyway it is a sturdy product and I may have to order 2 or 3 more, have them handy for my next project!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lover Lennie

customer_reviews.title: It’s not as big as I thought it was
customer_reviews.text: I like the set up however I thought it was a little bigger, I am using it for my daughters school set up area since they are online this year. I was disappointed because it came to me bent up which has made it a little unsturdy. She’s in college so she said it will work. I will not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Walking in destiny

customer_reviews.title: Variety of compartments
customer_reviews.text: This desk organizer is sturdy. It has a variety of compartments with some variance in sizes. Priced pretty accurate. Would be greay for college kids with a small desk area to work with. It keeps small items organized in one area.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the price.
customer_reviews.text: received this in quickly through shipping. it's pretty sturdy.. fairly roomy.. but minimal shipping packaging.. mine was dented in on one corner part of the mesh. It's not real visible so eh, not going to fuss over it. It's great for the price, I hold my pens and crochet hooks and scissors and post it's in it. I gave four stars for minimal packaging which is what likely caused the damage to the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lopez

customer_reviews.title: This isn't the greatest thing invented since the bread slicer
customer_reviews.text: This isn't the greatest thing invented since the bread slicer, but it is right up there. I was looking for an organizer to help with my building of plastic aircraft and armor models, but I couldn't have gotten a better organized, engineered product from NASA. It holds the scribers and panel pens, two 1/2 oz. paint containers perfectly (which eliminates careless spills), and 3" X 5" organizer cards with ample space left over for very-fine-point oil base sharpies. Kudos!! I'm going to get one for my grandson (no more worries about putting an elbow on your tube of glue).
customer_reviews.author: Richard Thomas

customer_reviews.title: and the quality is good, just had a bigger item in my mind
customer_reviews.text: I received this item ... but I didn't inspect it thoroughly yet! It's really small - I thought from the image it would be bigger. It is still cute though, and the quality is good, just had a bigger item in my mind. I bought this for my son's dorm room, so maybe smaller is better!
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic9

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who just went away to college and she's very pleased with it. It has plenty of space for her pens/pencils, highlighters and post it notes. I like the look of it and it keeps things organized and within easy reach when studying. It seems to be very sturdy and well made so I think she'll get years of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Katina Profice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Love how I can separate a lot of different items in the four corners. Now I don't have to fish around for what I need, I can separate highlighters, pens, pencils and sharpies and still have lots of room for different size Post-Its. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn222

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This exceeded my expectations. The bottom of the holder easily secures to a flat surface it doesn't move anywhere, This is so important with a product like this. It's well-made, You could probably stick 20 pens in each one of the slots.
customer_reviews.author: pinkcovered

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kitchen work area!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is exactly what I needed for my kitchen! I am disabled, and do my kitchen work sitting in a drafter's chair, the perfect height to work at the counters and my stove. So I like having things I use frequently close at hand. So I washed this really well and as of today, this holds pens, pencils, markers, scissors, meat thermometers, garlic press, spatulas, measuring spoons, binder clips, and tape, and I still have room for paper clips and something else small. I just got this a couple days ago, so I know I'll be rearranging things as I go!
customer_reviews.author: sundragonlady

customer_reviews.title: Helps tame desktop sprawl...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small organizer for some essentials for my classroom desk. This was reasonably priced, had what I was looking for, and possesses a small footprint (real estate on my desk is more valuable than Hong Kong). It's nice enough to look good but not so nice that Ali Baba and the 40 teachers won't be inclined to make off with it...yeah, I find that teachers are most egregious 'scroungers'. It's also well-built - this is important because it WILL end up on the floor a few times a month. All in all, a good purchase. I will probably buy more of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Martin

customer_reviews.title: a small thing of super glue, a sticky note pad
customer_reviews.text: I started accumulating a lot of desk supplies in the years I've worked for my company. I had two cups to hold everything but I wanted to be more organized. This fits two scissors, 4 highlighters, 6 pens, a small whole puncher, a handful of tacks, a small thing of super glue, a sticky note pad, and some binder clips. Works well as long as you don't over stuff the caddy. Only thing I would like improved is the mini-drawer to have a small railing inside so it doesn't slide out quickly when I need to move the caddy. Regardless, I'd recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Bought this for work to help keep stuff easy to get to and organized. I work at a wastewater plant and share a desk with other operators who are notorious for not putting stuff back and it seems to be working.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Works good, blah color, we want beige or ivory to brighten the office.
customer_reviews.text: So tired of black office stuff, beige would blend better, and easy to see items too. But ivory, white and beige are rare and cost more! Why? This is grey...sort of a prison color. But better than black. Make beige please.
customer_reviews.author: Artist in stitches!

customer_reviews.title: Good Size for Desk Supplies
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is the perfect size for my pens, pencils, highlighters, and other small desk supplies. The drawer holds standard size square sticky notes. The silver is a nice brushed nickel color and matches perfectly with my other organizer tools in/on my desk. The top does have a removeable/optional divided rectangular container that could divide the space into smaller portions.
customer_reviews.author: S. Young

customer_reviews.title: Nice Desktop Organizer!!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this a while back on Nov 3, 2016. There are 4 pen compartments, 1 box compartment, and 3 middle dividers for smaller objects. I mainly use this for college as it stores my needs 1) it storages all my essential desk needs 2) many compartments for other things (relate to my photo) 3) in the middle of the organizer are 3 dividers. Where i store my paperclips, little post it tabs, eraser, and white out. Hope this review helps! Very good desk organizer. Its clean, i like the color of black, and doesnt take up space.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: ... it arrived I realized my 8 year old would love it. And she did
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself but when it arrived I realized my 8 year old would love it. And she did!!!!! She started sorting her pencils, pens, post it notes, cute erasers, rulers, bookmarks, knick knacks etc etc immediately in all the little trays and compartments. Then when my husband came back from work she told him excitedly " Come take a look at my amazing new desk with everything organized!!!!' Its an awesome product and looks better in real life even than in the photo! Well made... !!!!
customer_reviews.author: WS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: So everything on the table (including the table) I bought from amazon. This new desk organizer is perfect and just what I needed. It keeps everything nice and neat on my table . As you can see I still have more room left in the organizer for more stuff. It looks great, its functional, and its not too bulky... Just get it already!
customer_reviews.author: Ferdie

customer_reviews.title: Very big and spacious desk organizer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my desk at work. Very spacious and allows me to separate my pens based on type (ie, fine point, ball point, highlighters, and other desk accessories like scissors and ruler). The top middle two sections are too small to put anything large but still useful. I use the little drawer to put eye drops and small mints for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Sora S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for a very busy desk!
customer_reviews.text: My desk was a disaster, with this organizer my office space is neat and tidy! It stores notecards and sticky note pads easily, my pens and pencils dont get stuck or break in the mesh, plus it's just the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Finster Faust

customer_reviews.title: Item is just as described and looks. Im using ...
customer_reviews.text: Item is just as described and looks. Im using it on my end table as a remote control caddy. As well as a few other things that were cluttering up my end table
customer_reviews.author: jim o

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk organizer!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect desk organizer! Since my husband and children have all been working from home, this has been the perfect addition to our desk. It’s sturdy and has the capacity to hold everything we could ever want it to. Glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this Organizer. Well made and it looks amazing. You can use it as is or you can spray paint it with the color you desire. Its amazing and it holds tons of pens colord crayons sticky notes and things. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Merna Kamel

customer_reviews.title: Keep it together
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to organize the top of my reading table a little bit. I wish the compartments were just a tad wider - have to curl my return address labels to fit, but it does the job keeping small miscellaneous items in one place. No more falling off the table and onto the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Mettam

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: The black organizer is perfect for all the office supplies, especially markers, pens, pencils, scissors, tapes, glue, and other little items. This cady looks polished and well-made. It's high-quality, and I love it. Now, my desk is organized and so is my brain!
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Everything at your fingertips
customer_reviews.text: I replaced several containers with this one item which gives me more desktop space on my computer table. I can keep the writing tools, clips, small pads of paper, stamps, scissors, etc. right in front of me.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Caporgno

customer_reviews.title: Organizer Desktop Caddy
customer_reviews.text: This caddy is exactly what I need. It has a space for all of the things (especially pens) I have spent too much time trying to find, because I didn't have them all together in one special place. Now, I can easily find my pens, highlighters, paper clips and other stuff that previously eluded me.
customer_reviews.author: Peg Cook

customer_reviews.title: organized obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely OCD when it comes to my desk, especially what's on top of it. I love this so much. It's not too big or too small. Fits everything I need. Has a insert In one of the top rectangular spaces, that is removable. Perfect for paper clips or push pins. Plenty of space for pens and my all time favorite, sticky notes. This is a must have for all teachers or anyone who has a desk
customer_reviews.author: Jmac14

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: This holds alot of pens, pencils, ect. The only thing that I wish is that the middle part with the drawer and 2 slots for paper clips ect was a little bigger but otherwise its great.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie F.

customer_reviews.title: Replaced 4 pencil holders
customer_reviews.text: This literally replaced 4 pencil holders I had on my desk. Not only that, it replaced the paperclip holder and sticky note holders I had. Literally got rid of 6 items. This is worth the buy. It came a tiny bit bent. But I honestly thought it was part of the design. Its amazing. Worth the buy and it came a day early!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price!
customer_reviews.text: As many of the other reviews have highlighted, this device is very useful and surprisingly well built for the price. The silver unit I ordered looks great in my bathroom, I which I was able to finally organize my countertop. I will most likely be ordering again if another organized is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore Alfieri

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed! Thank you
customer_reviews.text: I got so tired of searching for things around my desk, not being able to find what I needed, and everything was in disarray. I searched quite a while before I decided on this. It was delivered quickly and in perfect condition. It’s well-built and sturdy and will undoubtedly last for a long time. I now have everything in one place and I love it! It’s the perfect organizer and a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Frugal

customer_reviews.title: Great little organizer
customer_reviews.text: My family has a tendency to leave pens everywhere. Not anymore! I also love the little drawer for post-its and the other places for paperclips and other misc. stuff. Looks cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Cat

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this organizer! I use it for my colored pencils. My earsers. Eareser refills. Sharpeners. Scratch pads. Ect..... see my picture! I have it hanging where I draw. I'm not sure why Amazon wants my rating of it's remote control....
customer_reviews.author: Scritter

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these caddies for the desk in my office and was surprised how big and sturdy it was. Loved it so much I bought another one for the sewing room. I feel so much more "together" now!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed, and well built!
customer_reviews.text: Big upgrade form using mugs to hold my pens and pencils. Now I have so much more than just pens and pencils at an arms reach. I bought two, one for the office, and one for home.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kwon

customer_reviews.title: just what it should be
customer_reviews.text: this little organizer holds a multitude of pens and pencils, along with paper clips, etc. the drawer is bigger than it looks, and holds my correction ribbon, pencil sharpener, pencil leads and erasers, and several other small pesky items. the drawer itself is too loose, which is my only complaint; i'll put some duct tape on the sides to add friction, and that should fix it. the organizer is sturdy and attractive. good deal.
customer_reviews.author: teabag

customer_reviews.title: I really like the idea that I can switch from one holder ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the idea that I can switch from one holder to another whenever another tool is added to the mix--and I can see everything and not be obliged to pull open drawers and shuffle through papers to find that really good eraser or the right size paper clip. In retirement, I am just as busy as I ever was and miss my two secretaries. The Organizer Caddy saves much time and work for me--if only it could answer the phone. Only kidding. I truly could not do without it.
customer_reviews.author: Klemens Metternich

customer_reviews.title: It's not big and bulky but it holds a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's and I love it. The individual sections was the reason I choose the DecoBros caddy. It holds their markers, color pencils, writing pencils, and scissors. Homework time with two kids is now so organized and simple. I don't have to open different containers to hold that that would take up table space. The size of the caddy is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: It Handles What It Needs
customer_reviews.text: It's a small organizer that works very well for what it is. The pen/ruler cups hold a fair amount and I love that there are four of them to help with categorizing your pens and whatnot. The message pad cubbyhole is nice and the detachable top pieces are perfect for paperclips.
customer_reviews.author: J. Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Love this Caddy
customer_reviews.text: I wish I took a picture of this. I use it at my desk at work. This item came in quickly and was packaged very well. This DecoBros Desk Supplies Organizer Caddy had rubber feet on it so it stays where you want it on the desk. The drawer opened easily and it has a place to maybe hid a key. All of my essentials had fit in it, along with my post its and my desk had not been a mess since i had purchased this. A sturdy product and very useful.. This This is a wonderful product and I had planned on purchasing more for the college bound family members.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the desktop organized
customer_reviews.text: My husband had all of his writing tools and office supplies strewn on his desk. He loves this caddy. It puts everything in one place and it's easy to see what he has.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie N

customer_reviews.title: smaller than I expected but still great. A place for nearly everything I needed to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, smaller than I expected but still great. A place for nearly everything I needed to store. I have an architect drawing table and wanted something that would the industrial decor of the room plus keep the needed desk clutter organized and close by without taking up valuable drawing board space - this is perfect. Very happy it doesn't slide when the desk is angled too.
customer_reviews.author: Chef de Cuisine

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I use it to hold my crochet hooks and little things. I have a few desk organizers around the house. This isn't one of the prettier ones but great design shape and size
customer_reviews.author: Brigette Anne

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price! It is very spacious and holds a lot of supplies. The only downfall I would say is the post it note holder slides out easily but other than that its a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Kreitzman

customer_reviews.title: Organizing like no other
customer_reviews.text: I bought this desk organizer not to organize office supplies but to organize my nail art supplies and make up brushes. It has proven extremely useful and I love well it works. I only wish it had more slots and could turn. My favorite feature is how organized my supplies are but are still accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Cute Caddy
customer_reviews.text: The caddy is a cute way to store your office supplies. I wish it were a tad bit bigger, but that's not a big complaint. I should have looked at the dimensions...duh! Overall, good value for the price for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Engel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Desktop Organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I have been looking for to organize writing utensils on my desk. It is a definite upgrade from the usual pencil cup as it has four different slots to hold your pencils, pens, markers, etc. I keep small notepads in the drawer compartment and smaller items on top. It has a solid base so it won't get knocked over on your desk. It is just the right size to not take up too much room but still hold plenty of supplies.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Bent and wobbles
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was really happy with the purchase. It was a perfect size and seemed pretty sturdy. But when I took off the plastic I immediately noticed that the product was bent and it also wobbles when I put it on the table. You can see in the pictures that one side is straight while the other is way off. Sure it’s still useable but I didn’t pay for a lopsided piece of metal either.
customer_reviews.author: LeahV

customer_reviews.title: Desk caddy
customer_reviews.text: This fits in perfect for my home office. I like that it has different ares to hold pens, pencils, highlighters, paper clips and rubber bands as well as other items. If needed, I will purchase this item again. Very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk/Office organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is great at organizer and holds a lot in as little space as needed. I use to have a lot of pencils cups but I got rid of them all and just used this to organize pencils, pens and highlighters (since it has so many tall sections). And the drawer is very deep so it can hold a lot as well. I took some pictures of mine with things in it.
customer_reviews.author: Lil RicoTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is perfect if you have limited space, which is what I have. My office basically consists of a corner of my living room. My desk is pretty compact and is all metal and glass. This organizer matches perfectly. If I can edit this review, I will post a photo. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Maibaby523

customer_reviews.title: lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: It has all kinds of storage baskets and I actually used them all, in fact, bought two and clipped them together and use all the bins. I had a lot of stuff to organize. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Haberlen

customer_reviews.title: nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: it exactly as the picture, i thought each divider a tad bigger than that. it still hold plenty of pens though. the little pull out bin is plastic which is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Hanniee

product_meta.title: DecoBros Desk Supplies Organizer Caddy, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackDecoBros Desk Supplies Caddy helps you to organize Pen, note, and staples. USPTO Patent USD776757
feature_bullets: Mesh Oval Pencil Cup comes with extra organizational features
5 divided compartments to organize all your writing instruments
2 additional shallow compartments for holding clips or other small supplies
Small notched supply drawer pulls out to hold 2.5" x 3" notes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars6,251 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
